committee-description: The USSTM Board of Directors is a dynamic group of student leaders at Toronto Metropolitan University, dedicated to enhancing the academic and social experience for the Faculty of Science. The Board is committed to fostering a vibrant and inclusive community. Elected annually, these student leaders embody the spirit of innovation and collaboration, working to create a fulfilling experience for science students at TMU.
